data.title: B Site Cubby Pop Flash For Hookah
data.description: This is a great FLASH/DRIVE from the Cubby on B Site to pop flash players peeking out of Hookah.

data.title: FRAG/MENT To Delay A Site Truck Spike Plant
data.description: Here's a simple, but effective FRAG/MENT lineup for the front side of the Truck on A Site, that delays the Spike Plant there.

data.title: Back B Site Pop Flash For Hookah
data.description: This is a great FLASH/DRIVE from behind the B Site Tube to pop flash players peeking out of Hookah.

data.title: A Teleporter ZERO/POINT To Check B Short
data.description: This ZERO/POINT for the A Teleporter, suppresses / gathers information on players outside of Hookah in B Short, as well as some of the Hookah hallway, without opening up the Teleporter Doors.

data.title: A Bath ZERO/POINT From A Site
data.description: This quick and easy ZERO/POINT will both suppress and gather information on players in almost the entirety of A Bath with only a small area near the Attacker entrance into A Bath unaffected.

data.title: A Teleporter ZERO/POINT For B Hookah / B Garden
data.description: This ZERO/POINT is useful for both suppressing and gathering information on players in Hookah and B Garden.
